root.dao.message

Class ErrorMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.dao.message.AbstractMessage
      • root.dao.message.ErrorMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ErrorMessage
extends AbstractMessage
    A class that transmits messages between the server and the client when there is exception in the server
    Author:
    gal this dao message class used by the server, when there's a problem in client's request.
    See Also:
